mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(orderId, userId, receiver, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhone, amount) values (#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{receiver}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3}, #{orderPhone}, #{amount})
insert into tbl_order_details(orderDetailsNum, orderId, gdsNum, cartStock) select tbl_order_details_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, gdsNum, cartStock from cart
mapper.select: select orderId, userId, receiver, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhone, amount, orderDate, delivery from tbl_order where userId = #{userId} order by orderDate desc

select o.orderId, o.userId, o.receiver, o.userAddr1, o.userAddr2, o.userAddr3, o.orderPhone, o.amount, o.orderDate, o.delivery, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.thumbImg, g.price from tbl_order o inner join tbl_order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join tbl_goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.userId = #{userId} and o.orderId = #{orderId}
